mapper.select: select a.id, a.date, a.name, s.id studentId, s.studentNumber, s.name studentName, d.id departmentId, d.name departmentName, p.id adminId, p.name adminName from action a left join student s on a.studentId = s.id left join department d on s.departmentId = d.id left join admin p on a.adminId = p.id order by date desc limit #{start}, #{end}

select a.*, s.id studentId, s.studentNumber, s.name studentName, s.departmentId, d.id departmentId, d.name departmentName , ad.id adminId, ad.name adminName, ad.authority from action a left join student s on s.id = a.studentId left join department d on d.id = s.departmentId left join admin ad on ad.id = a.adminId where a.id = #{id}

select a.*, s.id studentId, s.studentNumber, s.name studentName, s.departmentId, d.id departmentId, d.name departmentName , ad.id adminId, ad.name adminName, ad.authority from action a left join student s on s.id = a.studentId left join department d on d.id = s.departmentId left join admin ad on ad.id = a.adminId where a.studentId = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into action(studentId, name, content, date, adminId) values(#{studentId}, #{name}, #{content}, #{date}, #{adminId});
